discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs in Your Area
discover_best_chefs_desc: The best homemade food prepared just for you. Browse, choose, and enjoy the authentic taste.
search_placeholder: Search for a chef or specialty...
no_chefs_available: No chefs are available at the moment.
try_different_search: Try a different search term or check back later.
wait_for_chefs: Please check back soon, new chefs might join!
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef hasn't added any dishes yet.
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet.
customer_login_desc: Enter your details to continue and order delicious dishes.
chef_login_desc: Enter your details to manage your orders and menu.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again.
customer_signup_desc: Create your account to start ordering delicious dishes.
chef_signup_desc: Share your culinary talent and start receiving orders.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
unauthorized_email_desc: This email is not allowed in this demo application.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If your email exists in our system, we've sent a reset link.
reset_link_sent_desc: If your email is registered, you will receive a password reset link.
demo_link_in_console: For demo purposes, the link is shown in the console.
password_reset_link_invalid: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
password_changed_successfully_desc: You can now log in with your new password.
reset_password_desc: Enter a new password for your account {{email}}.
no_new_orders: No new orders at the moment.
no_ongoing_orders: No orders are currently in progress.
no_completed_orders: You don't have any completed orders yet.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and hide your dishes from here.
coupon_management_desc: Create and edit promotional coupons to attract more customers.
no_coupons_desc: You don't have any promotional coupons. Create one now!
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon applies to.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to add to the coupon.
coupon_code_min_length: Coupon code must be at least 3 characters.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Code must contain only alphanumeric characters.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: At least one dish must be selected.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your delicious dishes to attract customers.
delete_dish_warning: This will permanently delete the dish '{{name}}'. This action cannot be undone.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
prep_time_positive: Prep time must be a positive integer.
dish_added_toast_desc: '{{name}}' has been added to your menu.
add_new_dish_title: Add a New Dish to Your Menu
dish_description_placeholder: Describe your dish in an appealing way for customers...
dish_ingredients_placeholder: Rice, pasta, lentils, chickpeas, tomato sauce...
no_ongoing_orders: You have no ongoing orders at the moment.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet
no_orders_yet_desc: Browse your favorite chefs' dishes and order now!
rate_order_placeholder: Leave a comment about your experience...
review_submitted_toast_desc: Your feedback helps us improve our service.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: Orders cannot be placed at this time. Please try again later.
login_required_desc: Please log in or create a new account to proceed.
delivery_information_desc: Your order will be delivered to the following address:
no_address_yet: No address has been provided yet.
no_phone_provided: No phone number has been provided.
chef_is_busy_desc: Your order will be waitlisted and confirmed as soon as the chef is available.
order_error_desc: Please log in and add a delivery address to proceed.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been added to the waitlist.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} has been sent to the chef for review.
coupon_limit_reached_error: The usage limit for this coupon has been reached.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon does not apply to this dish.
bio_placeholder: Write a short bio about yourself and your passion for cooking...
profile_updated_desc: Your information has been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: An error occurred while saving your changes.
change_password_desc: Make sure to use a strong password to keep your account secure.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check your old password and try again.
auth_password_requirements: Password must have at least 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase, one number, and one symbol.
auth_email_not_allowed: This email domain is not allowed.
auth_email_in_use: This email is already in use.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_passwords_do_not_match: The new passwords do not match.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is waitlisted. You'll be notified upon confirmation.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: You have a new waitlisted order from {{customerName}}.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: The chef has started preparing your {{dishName}}.
order_on_the_way_notification_title: Your order is on the way!
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is on its way to you now.
order_delivered_notification_desc: Enjoy your {{dishName}}! Don't forget to rate your experience.
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for {{dishName}} was rejected.
pending_orders_desc: You are now available. Check the orders that were waiting for you.
